issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: testMetaDataQueryRunInSYScompilationSchema() fails on small device platforms lacking the Norwegian locale

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

creator.name: olesolberg

reporter.name: olesolberg

fields.environment:
Product: phoneME Advanced (phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34)
Profile: Foundation Profile Specification 1.1
JVM: CVM phoneme_advanced_mr2-b34 (interpreter loop)

author.name: dagw
author.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

comments.body:
The VM seems to not find collator support for the "no" locale.. Is this an issue with the test's environment, perhaps?
Is this test intended to work only with en_US?

updateAuthor.name: dagw
updateAuthor.emailAddress: dag dot wanvik at oracle dot com

author.name: olesolberg
author.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

comments.body:
DERBY-3925_1.diff.txt  changes 
testMetaDataQueryRunInSYScompilationSchema
to use 'territory=en' instead of 'territory=no' if the 'no' locale is not available.
This is e.g. the case on phoneME.

A comment in the test states that
"This test is for databases with territory based collation."
so I think 'territory=en' should be OK?
Territory based collation is specified with 'collation=TERRITORY_BASED' (vs. default 'UCS_BASIC').

org.apache.derbyTesting.functionTests.tests.upgradeTests._Suite ran OK on phoneME and jvm1.6.
Running suites.All.

updateAuthor.name: olesolberg
updateAuthor.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

author.name: knutanders
author.emailAddress: knut dot hatlen at oracle dot com

comments.body:
I agree that territory=en should be fine, since it's still using territory based collation. +1 to commit.

(Minor nit: Perhaps break out of the loop as soon as the requested locale is found?)

updateAuthor.name: knutanders
updateAuthor.emailAddress: knut dot hatlen at oracle dot com

author.name: olesolberg
author.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM

comments.body:
Thanks Knut, for reviewing!
Added the break out of the loop.

updateAuthor.name: olesolberg
updateAuthor.emailAddress: Ole dot Solberg at Sun dot COM
